changeSet.createView: select a.NAME as APPLICATION_NAME, u.USER_NAME, o.NAME as OPTION_NAME, p.OPTION_VALUE, 'N' as IS_DEFAULT from PREFERENCE_T p,USER_T u,OPTION_T o,APPLICATION_T a where o.APPLICATION_ID=a.APPLICATION_ID and p.OPTION_ID=o.OPTION_ID and u.USER_ID=p.USER_ID union select a.NAME as APPLICATION_NAME, u.USER_NAME, o.NAME as OPTION_NAME, o.DEFAULT_VALUE as OPTION_VALUE, 'Y' as IS_DEFAULT from USER_T u,OPTION_T o,APPLICATION_T a where o.APPLICATION_ID=a.APPLICATION_ID and o.DEFAULT_VALUE is not null and not exists(select 1 from PREFERENCE_T p where p.OPTION_ID=o.OPTION_ID and p.USER_ID=u.USER_ID)
